name: Rex Quang Binh Hotel
address: 09 Bạch Đằng, Phường Nam Lý, Đồng Hới, Quảng Bình, Ðồng Hới, Việt Nam
description:
Rex Quang Binh Hotel có trung tâm thể dục, khu vườn, phòng chờ chung và sân hiên ở Ðồng Hới. Mỗi phòng tại khách sạn 4 sao này đều nhìn ra thành phố, đồng thời khách có thể sử dụng nhà hàng và quầy bar. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Tại Rex Quang Binh Hotel, các phòng đều đi kèm với ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn à la carte hoặc kiểu Á.

Tại Rex Quang Binh Hotel, khách có thể sử dụng hồ bơi trong nhà.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách khách sạn 6 km.

review.comment_positive: Lo staff, siamo stati serviti da Tien che è stata molto gentile e disponibile.

review.rating: Not the best but okay to stay.
review.comment_positive: It had an alright breakfast and the room was nice enough, pretty big.
review.comment_negative:
- it said they had a restaurant open and room service until 10pm. This wasn’t true and we had to get a taxi away to somewhere else.
- it wasn’t a great location. Close enough to airport and train station but not a walk away.
- breakfast was okay but tables weren’t always very clean. 
- the bathroom floor was dirty and had hairs.
- we were charged 60k for a dirty towel that wasn’t us. We believe it was put in the room. We’ve travelled for 6 months and haven’t got anything on us that would’ve made the significant stains that were on this towel. We came back from a day trip and it was in the room bagged and we were very confused. We’ve not done anything differently to the last 20+ hotels we’ve stayed in for the past 6 months travelling, maybe this was just a way to make more money during off season, I’m not sure, so a bit of a disappointing end. 
- we paid our room bill and they just kept the change without asking. I wouldn’t have minded but it was just the way they assumed. 
-overall it wasn’t expensive but I’ve stayed in better in Vietnam and SE Asia for the same price.

review.comment_positive: phòng sạch sẽ, ăn sáng đa dạng, ngon
Spaceous room, nice view.
review.comment_negative:
Unfortunately, communication with hotel staff was very difficult due to limited English skills. We arrived before check-in time and first we were told that the room was not yet available. However, the receptionist then tried to sell us an early check-in fee at a ridiculous price seconds later. We also booked a tour to Phong Nha national park at the reception, which needed several attempts and for which the staff was unable to give any additional information. 
Pool area was messy and noisy. Breakfast average at best. Loud Karaoke music in the evening. 
Overall, not what we expected from a hotel in this category. By far the worst experience we had on our travel to Vietnam.

This is a big hotel located 10 min by car from the city “center”. 
The rooms are cleaned and there is air conditioning.

review.comment_negative:
As a 5 stars hotel, you definitely don’t expect to pay extra for a low level Spa.
The staff also don’t speak English with the expectation of 1 single receptionist. I understand that maybe they don’t have a lot of tourists from other countries but English is a must in a 5 stars hotel. 

They also close the kitchen at 8:15 pm, I would suggest you advise the foreigners about it to avoid situations like in our case where we end up looking around the city for a restaurant.

review.rating: Ein sehr schönes Hotel mit ruhiger Lage

Die Damen an der Rezeption sind sehr herzlich und hilfsbereit.
Der Spabereich ist eigentlich ganz schön gemacht, leider gibt es keine Liegen und keinen Ruheraum.
Das Hotel ist zu empfehlen

Das Wasser in der Dusche war teilweise kühl.
Schöne Restaurants gibt es in der Nähe nicht wirklich

review.comment_positive:
Das Frühstücksbuffet war sehr umfangreich, Abgesehen vom warmen vietn. Essen, gab es auch für Europäer genügend Auswahl / eine Ecke mit Brot, Toast, Butter, Marmelade.
Mein Zimmer war sehr groß und gut ausgestattet. 2 Sessel (leider etwas verdreckt) und ein runder Tisch standen direkt vor einem kleinen Balkon. Das große Bett war sehr bequem. Ich hatte eine Massage gebucht, die sehr preiswert und gut war.
review.comment_negative: Der Spa-Bereich war sehr ausgestorben. Insgesamt ein schönes Hotel, aber es kam mir ziemlich verlassen vor. Ich wollte abends im Hotel-Restaurant (schöne Aussicht von oben) essen gehen, es hatte jedoch um 20 Uhr bereits geschlossen. Ich konnte mir das Gericht dann aufs Zimmer bestellen. Die Lage war für mich nicht so optimal, aber da das Wetter kühl und regnerisch war, habe den Aufenthalt sowieso nur für einen Tagesausflug zur Paradise Cave und Phung Nha Cave genutzt.

review.rating: Slip and fall safety problems with this hotel.
review.comment_positive:
Hotel nice.
Breakfast good.
Hotel probably for conventions, not western tourists.
Nothing more.
review.comment_negative:
The hotel is very far from everything. Too far to walk so need taxi to do anything. No restaurants nearby.

Room smelled of cigarette smoke when we first entered.

The balcony has a high step to leave the room and return. Not a good design.

Bathroom has a big safety problem for all customers.  
The shower is in a bath which is too high to step in and out easily. There are no hand grab rails and it is very very easy to slip and fall when everything is wet. Bath edge is above the surrounding tile so huge amount of water drains to the floor.
 
We looked at a different room on a different floor but it had the same problem.
We stayed at this hotel 1 night and moved to a hotel in old town Dong Hoi for an additional week.

review.comment_negative:
Since there weren't a lot of people staying in the hotel, they didn't set up the breakfast buffet. We had to order à la carte and there were only two options: Beef Pho or eggs. We understand it's not doable for a hotel to set up the whole breakfast buffet if there's two people but it would have been nice to have more à la carte options in that case (or they informed us before arrival/checking in). We checked in early (06.15 am) since we arrived by night train and you have to pay extra in that case (half of the price per night if you check in before 8 am). Staff is really really friendly but it was a bit of a challenge to communicate in English (understandable though). 
Overall nice, but did not live up to the expectations. Sorry!

review.rating: Faw away from the center, lacks detailed care and English skills.
review.comment_positive: The hotel room was nice and very spacious. You can also book the cave tour through the hotel.
review.comment_negative:
Location is too far away from the downtown and there are restaurants mostly for drinking. 
The room was not thoroughly clean because we found some cigarettes at the balcony, the glassware was not clean, left with some kind of coffee residues!! That’s like missing basics…
The staff were nice but like most regions in Vietnam, they dont speak good English. So sometimes it was hard for us to communicate with them. 
The breakfast place looks nice and has a variety of selection but actually there are not many things that you would like to eat. The quality of the food itself should be improved. 
The last thing the cave tour was available in two versions but because the staff did not tell us anything about the adventure tour, which we wanted to do, we thought the plain tour was the adventure tour but it was not so..to be honest our time at Dong Hoi was not so satisfactory.

review.comment_positive: Просторный, чистый номер с самой удобной кроватью) Отличный завтрак

review.rating: This was a short notice booking but very happy to have selected this property. Beautiful hotel & the receptionist Li

review.comment_negative: Should not expect English in Central Vietnam, but it's absence made for uncertainty. The place was pretty deserted, which was good and bad.

review.comment_positive: Sauna was lovely

Compte tenu du peu d’européens qui fréquentent cet hôtel, le petit déjeuner, constitué essentiellement de soupes et de nouilles, n’est pas dans nos attentes.

review.comment_negative: 朝食は種類多いが、そこまで美味しくない。ドンホイのビーチやスーパーからは遠い。

review.comment_positive: Het pand en de ruime kamer zijn prachtig. Daarnaast is het ook een fijne locatie en een goede uitvalsbasis voor uitstapjes naar de grotten (45 minuten afstand ongeveer).
review.comment_negative:
Als je wat langer door Vietnam reist, kom je erachter dat bedrijven meer promoten dan ze eigenlijk te bieden hebben. Dit hotel had daar ook een handje van. 

Zo worden er meerdere restaurants aangeprezen in o.a. de lift, maar als je op de verdieping stopt is er geen restaurant te bekennen. In het ontbijt restaurant kan je gelukkig ook lunchen en dineren, maar niet alle maaltijden zijn beschikbaar. Bij het bestellen van het diner bleek de kok ook net naar huis te zijn... De wil tot het aanbieden van de meest fantastische dingen is aanwezig, alleen verloopt het nog niet heel soepel.

review.comment_positive: Our room was a very good size and was very clean upon our arrival. The hotel is very well decorated and all amenities provided were clean. We ate in the restaurant on each night of our stay and our food was always nice and the staff very friendly.  The hotel is a very good location if you are looking to do day trips to explore the caves.
review.comment_negative: Although not a problem for us, the karaoke can be heard in the rooms, and if being used in the evening may disturb if you want an early night.

Lobby bar was seldom occupied by anyone serving to get a drink. DisOrganized chaos seemed to prevail in the resturant.

review.rating: Pas le bon endroit pour une famille avec enfant(s).
review.comment_positive: Pas grand chose.
review.comment_negative:
Le bruit de la musique qui raisonne dans tout l’hotel jusqu’à 22:00. 
Le petit déjeuner qui est annoncé comme un buffet mais qui au final ne l’est pas. 
Le room service qui est indiqué par la réception comme se terminant à 22:00 mais impossible de commander a 21:00.
Le staff de la réception qui ne sert pas à grand chose.
Je fais court pour ne pas accabler plus que ça. 
En résumé c’était un séjour au gout amer qui même si nous revenons chaque année à Dong Hoi, nous n’irons certainement plus dans cet hotel qui vend un produit interessant mais ne délivre pas le minimum. 
ps: ca ne coute rien d’être honnête en explicitant qu’il y a de la musique très fort dans l’hotel le soir et que le petit déjeuner n’est pas un buffet en low season, ce qui est compréhensible d’ailleurs. Ca permet juste à ceux pour qui ca convient de venir et aux autres de passer leur chemin.

review.comment_positive: Viel Platz.
review.comment_negative:
Die 4 Sterne hat das Hotel nicht verdient.
Der Pool ist ungepflegt, der Spa-Bereich geschlossen.
Das Frühstücksbuffet ist leider weder europäisch, noch vietnamesisch, sondern deckt eher andere asiatische Länder ab. Und schmeckt leider nicht.
Die anderen asiatischen Länder scheinen auch die Zielgruppe dieses zu sein.
Die Lautsprecher außerhalb des Hotels sind sehr laut und der Bass dröhnt bis ins Zimmer. Auch sonst ist das Hotel leider sehr hellhörig.

Noch dazu gibt es in Dong Hoi nichts zu unternehmen, lieber mit dem Nachtzug morgens anreisen, die Höhlen anschauen und dann abends wieder nichts wie weg.

review.rating: Looks are decieving, a oid this hotel.
review.comment_positive: Everything was terrible.
review.comment_negative: No English speaking staff. No air conditioning except in rooms, photos on internet and details do not correspond with rooms they allocate. No restaurant  only breakfast and nothing decent close by. UnBle to get capachino, unable to get coke, unable to get cold water (only warm). Karakoe could be heard 5 floors away  week night and was awful. Drains don't drain and come up flooding bathroom. Bench with kettle no power point had to boil jug on the floor. Exposed wiring in lounge covered with electrical tape sticking out. They demanded to keep our passports during the stay which we refused. Local kids swim daily in tiny pool take over facilities and are very loud.

review.comment_positive: Great room size and convenient for cave tour pick ups. The hotel is not far from the airport either. The breakfast is not continental and offers limited choice to vegetarians. Otherwise the place was clean and had a good stay at Rex!

Petit coin cosy avec bar où on peut prendre des cocktails. Quelques restaurants vietnamiens aux alentours. A priori restauration possible à  l'hôtel mais à confirmer. Petit déjeuner copieux avec un grand choix. Bon rapport qualité prix.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King

Excellent roof top pool, well equipped gym.
review.comment_negative: The Western breakfast options were very limited. Asked for honey for the porridge but they didn’t have any. We stayed for 3 nights and only took breakfast on the first day. After that we went somewhere else.

review.rating: Has potential, but can be improved
review.comment_positive: In terms of luxury and comfort the hotel scores really good. We had great (huge) luxury suite on the 10th floor, and we really liked it. The pool on top of the hotel was very welcome, and there was a great restaurant in the same street, however...
review.comment_negative: Comparing the Rex hotel to previous hotels in the same pricing category, i unfortunately must say it didn't score as much as the others. There is nothing wrong with the hotel itself, but the staff doesn't make you feel at home. Everything is really transactional, no good mornings or good byes when you pass the reception for example, which is something you get use to in the nicer hotels in Vietnam. Also every day there was a party or wedding on the top floor, which we could hear VERY clearly in our room 4 stories down. Not something we get annoyed by since it stopped on a decent time, but for the premium you pay for this hotel it's just not fitting. (I would at least put a notice that there is a party going on so guests know this.) No towels available for the swimingpool so everyone is dripping wet in the elevator. As you understand probably by now it are just small things. Hope they improve because it's really a nice hotel!

review.comment_positive: Sehr hilfsbereites und zuvorkommendes Personal, ruhiges und sauberes Zimmer mit sehr schöner Aussicht, westliches und asiatisches Frühstück

review.rating: Great for business, leisure should look elsewhere
review.comment_positive: In general, I think this hotel is perfectly suitable for business travelers, not soo much for tourists. The hotel looks nice and the staff was friendly, the rooms spacious and meet the necessary requirements.
review.comment_negative:
The location is far away from the city and nothing to do nearby (for tourists).
The breakfast buffet caters to Vietnamese people primarily with a very limited selection of 'western' breakfast preferences (pastry, bread, fruit, yoghurt, etc).
There is a karaoke machine on the 12th or 14th floor, what appeared to be one person sang for about 3 to 4 hours straight (not a joke or exaggeration) which we could clearly hear in our room on the 9th floor as well as a great number of people in the surrounding area.
